trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> class.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets or sets a value that indicates that the gallery category distributes all its available width equally between its columns.
The ColumnsStretchToFill property only has an effect when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope%2A> is set to `true`.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the gallery category distributes its available width equally between its columns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.ColumnsStretchToFill*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> object.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> for the ribbon gallery header.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
One of the enumeration values that specifies the visibility of the header.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.HeaderVisibility*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether this gallery category defines the scope used for uniform layout of items.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this gallery category defines the scope used for uniform layout of items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The maximum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.
The registered default is <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.MaxColumnCount*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The minimum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel*>.The registered default is 1.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.MinColumnCount*> dependency property.
To be added.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.

This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> event and adds an event listener to listen for currency changes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> for the category.
The event data.
Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property changes.
Information about the change.
Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property changes.
The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Receives events from the centralized event manager.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
The object that originated the event.
The event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it receives an event that it does not recognize or handle.
